duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform day-to-day bookkeeping including accounts receivable, accounts payable, processing checks, preparing bank deposits, bank reconciliations, and preparing financial reports using UNANET A/E accounting software.
Analyze accounting information and prepare cash flow, profitability, and other reports to present to Partners in regular monthly meetings.

Perform HR-related matters such as timesheets management, processing payroll (ADP), maintaining employee files, tracking leave, and managing benefits including health insurance, life and disability insurance, and 401-K.
Assist outside CPA with the information needed for income tax filings and/or audits.
